dsOverview.title: Shea's Stratospheric Zonal Wind and Temperature Profiles, monthly 1953-1988

summary.p: This dataset contains monthly profiles of temperature and zonal winds at stratospheric levels between 70mb and 10mb for the period from January 1953 to December 1988.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UCAR/NCAR/CGD/CAS > Climate Analysis Section, Climate and Global Dynamics Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
FU-BERLIN/METEO/SRG > Stratospheric Research Group, Meteorological Institute, Freie Universitat Berlin

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Upper Level Winds
